channel.title: NEED HELP! How can i install Xmx500m!
channel.description:
Hello, i need to know how i can install Xmx500m java and where?
I got teamviewer, This is what happending when i run my server... [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/5mdfg6.png[/img]
Plz help me!!

item.title: NEED HELP! How can i install Xmx500m!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“strpkz, post:8, topic:419819”][quote author=Coelho link=topic=522351.msg3798480#msg3798480 date=1319838569]
http://downloadmoreram.com/
[/quote]I lol’d you can’t just download RAM. lool.[/quote]

if only…

and your xmx arguments decide how much ram you’re currently allocating, you’re allocating 500mbs of ram, which isn’t an awful lot. Especially if you’re on a new computer. Try changing your arguments to something more appropriate…such as Xmx215m

Read full topic

item.source: NEED HELP! How can i install Xmx500m!

item.title: NEED HELP! How can i install Xmx500m!
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Urge, post:3, topic:419819”][quote author=Doobage link=topic=522351.msg3798449#msg3798449 date=1319836920]

Hello, i need to know how i can install Xmx500m java and where?

I got teamviewer, This is what happending when i run my server…

Plz help me!!

xmx500m is not a Installable file, it just runs in the CMD or batch file you use to run the client.

just make sure your paths are set to the right java folder and it should work fine.
[/quote]
But how i fix it? i need to download something?[/quote]

It could not initialize the VM - The virtual machine. The class it was trying to load could not be found because it does not exist. Change java/lang/Object to class/lang/Object or classes/lang/Object or some shit like that. You do not download anything… Also you want to make sure the run is Java and not Javac or anything else.

Read full topic
